text: Peter Frank Schabarum (January 9, 1929 â€“ August 1, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the California State Assembly from 1967 until 1972. He was a member of the Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors from 1972 until 1991. Schabarum was born in Los Angeles. He was a member of the Republican Party. In the 1950s, he played for the San Francisco 49ers. Schabarum died on August 1, 2021 in Los Angeles at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Peter F. Schabarum
